title: Why do teachers complain about students talking? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hard to teach when students are talking. Hard for students to listen and learn if they are talking at the same time as the teacher is teaching. It’s that simple. Plus it’s rather rude. You are in a classroom to learn. If the teacher is talking or instructing then you should be quietly listening and concentrating on what is being taught or said as an instruction. If you are talking then you missed something of the conversation and the person who you were talking to missed it to along with 2 or 3 others who could hear you in the background. So you disturbed 5–6 people and prohibited them from hearing what the teacher had to say. I guarantee that it was more important than what you had to say. Once the lesson is over you are usually given time to work on homework and that is the time that you can discuss the work and not socialize. Socializing is during your break before the class starts or during lunch and after school. You can talk during group work time as well but that is work time not a social time. There is a time to talk and a time to be silent. Students need to learn that etiquette. It’s what happens in the real world and you need to be talk when to talk and when not to.

The untrained teachers elsewhere who don’t know how to tackle, engage and concentrate their students in classes ever complain about students talking. Sometimes they also do say that they couldn’t maintain awesome result because students are irresponsible and ever remain busy in talking while attending classes lecture. Such are the teachers who have no command over their subject or otherwise the professionals who when enter in class, they know how to interact the students, and know how to make the topic more interested to engage the students’ patience towards learning skills and achieve their desired goals awesomely and easily with the help of their fun learning scientific techniques teaching methodology. They know how to motivate the behavior of children and they never complain because they know their professional tools usage to handle any critical situation while teaching a wide nature variety of students in class. Remain blesses
